modName: Nif File I Need Help With
summary:
This is the file I would like some help with if atall possible 

thanks 

Dan
descriptionHtml:
Hey I posted this in a seperate forum but its seems more appropriate here 

I am trying to add a face mask section to these robes/ hood and have run into a few problems and was wondering if there was anyone that could lend me a hand. 

This is the file structure as it stands at the miniute I have left all details in dismemberskininstance blank as when I start messing with them thats when things go a little wrong for me, if anyone has any ideas or could help me out please please PLEASE let me know 

thankyou

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/3171816-1324501016.jpg[/img]

note (I am not having problems with anything in the BSLightingShader section) I have left the mask white purley for visual representation,
author: Daniel Bourne
